technical_risks: Data migration complexity due to format differences
Performance degradation risk during peak hours
business_risks: Limited rollback window due to high criticality
Potential service disruption exceeding downtime tolerance
Resource allocation constraints during migration period
mitigation_recommendations: Implement phased migration approach to minimize risk exposure
Establish comprehensive testing protocol with staging environment
Create detailed rollback procedures with automated triggers
Schedule migration during off-peak hours to reduce impact
Conduct thorough data validation testing before go-live
Prepare dedicated support team for post-migration monitoring
